traits.name: Dual Consciousness
entries: The dolgrim has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

actions.name: Morningstar
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
